showAlerttext:
How does affiliate marketting work?
Find and join an affiliate program.
Choose which offers to promote.
Obtain a unique affiliate link for each offer.
Share those links on your blog, social media platforms, or website.
Collect a commission anytime someone uses your links to make purchase.
payment_released_but_pending: Payment released by Owner but current status is pending, it will be refelected in some time in your account.
payment_released_but_no_details: Payment released by Owner but current status is pending. Please add payment details by navigating to profile to receive payments.
payment_released_but_unclaimed: The email you entered does not have a PayPal account. A link to sign up for a PayPal account was sent to the recipient. Please contact support for more details
task_completed_but_no_payment: As you have completed the task please wait until the payment is released by owner.
